AnnotationFragment - Class in story.book.view
Annotation fragment is the right tab in StoryFragmentReadActivity This is the view for displaying all types of media annotations posted by users on the currently open in Reading Fragment (reading tab) Annotations are added one at a time and are only saved if the user taps the "Post" button
